short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the annoying hover effects and replaces them with click events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
www.klingen.dk has some terribly annoying effects. In order to see the menu cards, you have to hover the boxes - and they slide back up if your mouse leaves it again.
This extension removes this, so you have to click on the boxes in order to display the menu card.
Also prettifies the website a little.
